description:
This ultra strong, efficient pulley is great for rescue missions, heavy hauling and intensive use. Note that it’s too heavy for mountaineers to carry for emergency use.

  • Aluminum side plates and large-diameter sheave mounted on sealed ball bearings for excellent efficiency
  • Accepts up to three carabiners
  • Fits ropes 7-13mm
  • Breaking strength rated to 36kN
  • CE and UIAA approved
name: Petzl Rescue Pulley
